summary: This is an email chain from September 2019 regarding the status of the taint review of materials seized from Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence. The agents on the case are requesting an update on the review process, which was made available on September 10, 2019, and need information for a meeting with the ADIC.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The materials seized from his Manhattan residence are the subject of the taint review being discussed.

events.title: Materials from Epstein's residence made available
events.description: Materials seized from Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence were made available for taint review.

events.title: Supervisors request taint review status update
events.description: Supervisors requested a status update on the taint review process, needing information before a meeting with the ADIC about the case.

keyFacts: A taint review was being conducted on materials seized from Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence.
The seized materials were made available for review on September 10, 2019.
As of September 17, 2019, the agents' supervisors were requesting a status update on the taint review process.
The update was needed for a meeting with the ADIC (Assistant Director in Charge) about the case.
